div.l: They coude not though they did alle her myght
Her capil cache he ran alwey so faste
Til in a diche they caught at the laste
Wery and wete as beste is in the rayne
Comyth sely Iohn and wᵗith hym aleyne
Allas quoth Iohn the day that I was borne
Now ar we dreven to hethynge ⁊and to scorne
Oure corne is stole men wolle vs folis calle
Both the wardeyn and oure felowes alle
And namly the myller welawey
Thus playneth Iohn as he goth be the wey
Taward the mylle and bayarde in his honde
Me Miller sittynge be the fire he fonde
For it was nyght ⁊and ferther myght they noght
But for the loue of god they hym besought
Of herberowe and of ese as for her peny
The myller seide ageyne yf there be eny
Suche as hit is yet shulle ye haue yoᵘur part
Myn hous is streyte / but ye haue lerned art
Ye can by argumēntes maken a space
Mile brode of twanty foote of space
Let se nowe yf this place wolle suffice
Or make it rōmmer wᵗith speche as is yoᵘur gise
Nowe Symond seide this Iohn be seynte CudbardCubardCudbard
Ay is thou mery and that is welle answerd
I haue herde sey that mēn shuld take of twa thynges
Swilke as he fyndes or swilke as he brynges
But specially I pray the hooste so dere
Gete vs som mete and drynke ⁊and make chere
And we wolle truly at the fulle
Wᵗith emtptyentyempty hondes mēn may not hawkys culle
Loo here my siluere redy for to spende
